verses.verse: O Lord<WH3068>, rebuke<WH3198> me not in your wrath<WH7110>: neither chasten<WH3256> me in your hot displeasure<WH2534>.
For your arrows<WH2671> stick fast<WH5181> in me<WH3027>, and your hand presses me hard<WH5181>.
There is no soundness<WH4974> in my flesh<WH1320> because<WH6440> of your anger<WH2195>; neither is there any rest<WH7965> in my bones<WH6106> because<WH6440> of my sin<WH2403>.
For my iniquities<WH5771> are gone over<WH5674> my head<WH7218>: as a heavy<WH3515> burden<WH4853> they are too heavy for me<WH3513>.
My wounds<WH2250> stink<WH887> and are corrupt<WH4743> because<WH6440> of my foolishness<WH200>.
I am troubled<WH5753>; I am bowed down<WH7817> greatly<WH3966>; I go<WH1980> mourning<WH6937> all the day long<WH3117>.
For my body<WH3689> is filled<WH4390> with a loathsome<WH7033> disease<WH4974>: and there is no soundness in my flesh<WH1320>.
I am feeble<WH6313> and severely<WH3966> broken<WH1794>: I have groaned<WH7580> by reason of the disquietness<WH5100> of my heart<WH3820>.
Lord<WH136>, all my desire<WH8378> is before you<WH585>; and my groaning is not hid from you<WH5641>.
My heart<WH3820> pants<WH5503>, my strength<WH3581> fails<WH5800> me<WH216>: as for the light of my eyes<WH5869>, it<WH1992> also is gone from me<WH369>.
My lovers<WH157> and my friends<WH7453> stand<WH5975> aloof from<WH5048> my sore<WH5061>; and my kinsmen<WH7138> stand<WH5975> afar off<WH7350>.

They also that seek<WH1245> after my life<WH5315> lay snares<WH5367> for me<WH1875>: and they that seek my hurt<WH7451> speak<WH1696> mischievous things<WH1942>, and imagine<WH1897> deceits<WH4820> all the day long<WH3117>.
But I<WH2795>, as a deaf man<WH8085>, heard not<WH483>; and I was as a mute man that opens<WH6605> not his mouth<WH6310>.
Thus I was as a man<WH376> that hears<WH8085> not<WH6310>, and in whose mouth are no reproofs<WH8433>.
For in you<WH3068>, O Lord, do I hope<WH3176>: you will hear<WH6030>, O Lord<WH136> my God<WH430>.
For I said<WH559>, Hear me<WH8055>, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me<WH7272>: when my foot slips<WH4131>, they magnify themselves against me<WH1431>.
For I am ready<WH3559> to halt<WH6761>, and my sorrow<WH4341> is continually before me<WH8548>.
For I will declare<WH5046> my iniquity<WH5771>; I will be sorry<WH1672> for my sin<WH2403>.
But my enemies<WH341> are lively<WH2416>, and they are strong<WH6105>: and they that hate<WH8130> me wrongfully<WH8267> are multiplied<WH7231>.
They also that render<WH7999> evil<WH7451> for good<WH2896> are my adversaries<WH7853>; because I follow<WH7291> the thing that good is<WH2896>.
Forsake<WH5800> me not<WH3068>, O Lord: O my God<WH430>, be not far from me<WH7368>.
Make haste<WH2363> to help<WH5833> me<WH136>, O Lord my salvation<WH8668>.
